column1:
The information requested below relates to non-consolidated performance related payments (NCPRP) for the performance year 2011-12 only. 
Do not include any payments that relate to performance for year 2012-13.
Please ensure you have read the accompanying guidance notes before attempting to complete this template.
column6: NB: Main departments should co-ordinate returns for all their relevant agencies in scope for this exercise and send to Cabinet Office one return that contains a line of information for each organisation.

column27: IUK - The terms and conditions of IUK Commercial specialists, who transferred into HM Treasury under a TUPE transfer from PUK, included a personal performance pay scheme. These terms and conditions have now been harmonised and the PRP removed from 1 October 2012

Other than the CEO, all staff are classified as non-SCS, reducing direct comparability with most other departments/agencies. Data is not shown where to disclose could identify the individual in advance of the year end statutory reporting.
Headcount figures exclude secondees and interims. All cost, including staff costs, are re-charged to RBS
